name: Census
description:
BY ROO-PIGEON

Ainsley & Summer


Public Service Announcement: This is a prototype, weird happenstances may occur.

Census is a fantasy RPG about being a census-taker in a fantastical world.

 

  The mysterious Federal Government and the severely underfunded National Committee of Federal Census-Conduction (NCFCC) only see fit to conduct a census once every one hundred years. Because of this, a lot of people are unaware of the NCFCC and the census as a whole.

You play as the recently promoted Acting Assistant Director of Census-Taking (or Censor, for short) at the local NCFCC office. You are tasked with going out into the town of Anifail and getting as many people as possible to fill out the census.

Be sure to read the Installation Instructions included in each .zip & the controls found on the main menu!
